title: Pbe download
body: Im having a issue i extract the folder run it and the client says that the old client has been put to rest and has a button that takes you to download the whole game again can anyone help me to get pbe working pls

replies.body:
Go here:

https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe 
Click the "already have a pbe  account? Download here."  It'll give you an exe which will install the actual PBE and not the one you've downloaded. 

(Not sure if you already solved this issue).
you will click your region of acc and it will start dowload
{{sticker:katarina-love}} is this a nice, but my PBE account go repair! why?

Aw wow, that portion is a nostalgic ride.  The PBE client is a separate client entirely, so you'll want to install that independently.  Make sure not to install it in the same directory as your League of Legends live client.

i actually did put it in a different directory as my league live client still trying to make me download the live version when i first did the download it also corrupted my original league client and files and i had to reinstall the game again
